text.料理の音に敏感で、ついそばだててしまう: Sensitive to the sounds of cooking, \nto which they unintentionally prick up.
text.走る事を考えてると、たまに何も聞いてない: Sometimes deaf to her surroundings \nwhen she's thinking about running.
text.称賛と会長の声は絶対に聴き逃さない: Guaranteed to pick up praise \nand Pres' voice.
text.ユーロビートを聴くとかっ飛ばしたくなる: Hearing eurobeat makes her \nwant to step on the gas.
text.歓声の中でも故郷の人の声は聞き分けられる: Can pick out the voices of her \nhometown's fans from a crowd.
text.突然他人の耳を塞ぎ『だ～れだ？』と尋ねる: Will randomly cover stranger's ears \nand ask "Guess who～?"
text.触れられると異様に照れるらしい: Seems to become oddly embarrassed \nwhen they are touched.
text.隠している本音が無意識に漏れ出てしまう: They inadvertently leak her true feelings.
text.パーティーと聞けばどこへでも駆けつける: She'll run to the ends of the earth upon \nhearing the sounds of a party.
text.お茶を点てる時は微動だにしない: They don't move a millimeter \nwhen she's setting tea.
text.人前ではツンと立ててしまいがち: Inclined to keep them pointed \nsharply upright when in public.
text.カウントを聴くと身構えてしまう: Starts getting pumped and ready \nwhen she hears a countdown.
text.どんな言葉も賞賛に聞こえる: Hears any and all words as admiration.
text.ファンファーレを聞くと血が滾る: Her blood starts rushing when she \nhears the fanfare.
text.ダジャレを思いつくと、ピクンと大きく動く: Become very active when she \ncomes up with a new pun.
text.花の世話をする時は優しくかすかに垂れる: Droop slightly and gently down when \nshe's taking care of flowers.
text.エモの波動をキャッチすると毛が逆立つ: Their coat stands on end when \nshe becomes emotional.
text.時折、意味深にピンと立っている: There are great implications behind \nthe times they stand erect.
text.庶民文化の話題には興味津々: Has a keen interest in hearing about \nthe commoner's culture.
text.幼い頃は物音に敏感で、よく驚いていた: They were sensitive to sound when she \nwas a child, which often startled her.
text.耳抜きがとても上手: She's very skilled at clearing her ears.
text.彼女にだけ聞こえる声があるらしい: Apparently she can hear \na voice no one else can.
text.眠っていても命令が耳に入ると即座に起きる: She will rise from sleep immediately \nupon hearing commands.
text.少女漫画を読んでいる時はくるくるよく動く: In a state of constant twisting and \nturning when she reads shoujo manga.
text.どんなに微かな空腹音も必ずキャッチする: Pick up on the slightest noises \nof hungry stomachs.
text.他人の不幸な話を聞くとしゅんと垂れる: Hang down in sadness when hearing \nof people's misfortunes.
text.小さい子の声につい反応してしまう: Can't help but react to the voices \nof little children.
text.耳やおでこを触れられることは断固拒否する: Strongly refuses to let her ears \nor forehead be touched.
text.お姉ちゃんという声に、ついピクっと動く: Twitch when she hears the word "sister".
text.祭りばやしの音を聞くと、踊るように動く: Twirl as if dancing when she hears \nthe sound of festival music.
text.親友曰く『耳の動きすら鬱陶しい』: "Even the way your ears move \nis annoying!" ―Her best friend.
text.ロジカルな思考中は直立する: Stand straight up when she's in her \nlogical thinking mode.
text.メトロノームの音を聞くと癒される: The sound of a metronome soothes her.
text.手招きするように動いたら、甘えたい時: When she moves them in a beckoning \nmotion, it means she wants attention.
text.ウマ娘の中で最もティアラの似合う耳と自負: Prides herself on being the horsegirl \nwith ears most befitting a tiara.
text.目覚まし時計に勝ちたいとは思っている: She'd like them to win out \nover her alarm clock.
text.人の話は半分くらいしか聞こえていない: Only ever hear half of what others say.
text.新しいいたずらを思いつくとぴこぴこする: They ping back and forth when she \nthinks of a new prank.
text.知らない単語はすべて呪文に聞こえる: Every word she doesn't know \nsounds like an incantation.
text.耳かきをするのは得意だが、されるのは苦手: She's good at ear cleaning, but doesn't \nlike to be on the receiving end.
text.ファンの声は1人残らず拾う: Pick up the voice of \nevery one of her fans.
text.物語の山場になるとピンと反り返る: When a story reaches its climax, \nthey lie tensely bent backwards.
text.両耳を畳んで写真撮影するのを流行らせたい: She wants to start a trend of having \nears folded down in pictures.
text.帽子の耳用の穴は、自分で切って縫った: She added the ear holes \nin her beanie herself.
text.さわると安心感に包まれ、癒されると評判: They have a reputation \nfor being healing and \ncomforting when touched.
text.難しい言葉は右から入って左から流れ出る: Hard words go in \nthe right and come \nout the left.
text.ハチマキを外すと垂れそうになる: Start drooping when she takes \noff her headband
text.助けを求める声には必ず反応する: Always react to cries for help.
text.たまに方位占いに使う: She will sometimes use \nthem to point while \nfortune-telling.
text.足で耳に触ることができる: Can touch her ears with her feet
text.男性の声を聞くと固まってしまう: She freezes up when she \nhears men's voices.
text.ネーチャンと聞くとつい反応してしまう: They tend to react when \nshe hears the word \n"nee-chan".
text.一流にふさわしい話題以外耳に入れたくない:
They don't want to hear 
anything other than 
topics adequate for the 
first-class.
text.周りが騒がしくても聞き流せる: Take no notice of busy surroundings.
text.風向きと風の強さを感知できる: They can sense wind \ndirection and wind \nstrength.
text.追い詰められるほど、嬉しそうにピクつく: Twitch ever more happily \nthe more she's ran down
text.音感に優れている: She has an excellent \nsense of sound.
text.いい格言が思い浮かぶとピクンと震える: When she thinks of a good \nproverb, her ears tingle.
text.ガラスの割れる音がすると耳を伏せてしまう: The sound of breaking \nglass makes her ears tilt \ndownwards.
text.可愛い声を聞くとほんのり赤くなる: She blushes a little when \nshe hears a pretty voice.
text.耳かきされると、すぐ眠ってしまう: Falls asleep easily while \ngetting her ears cleaned.
text.ラッパの音が聞こえるとピンと背筋が伸びる: Stand up when hearing \nthe sound of a horn
text.耳のパーツモデルをやったことがある: She has done parts modelling for ears.
text.地獄耳！: Sharp in all the wrong ways!
text.自分と似た耳のウマ娘は目で追ってしまう: Twitch ever more happily the \nfurther she's cornered
text.俺を謳うは俺――（※取材陣を無視しがち）: I sing my own pra―― \n(※Tends to ignore the press)
text.音楽が聞こえると耳を澄ますこともある: Can stand straight and attentive \nwhen listening to music
text.マッサージは耳の先までしてもらう: She likes to be massaged all the way \nto the tips of her ears
text.イヤリングをよくなくし、今ので9代目: Often loses earrings, \nthis is her 9th set
text.ここ一番の瞬間にキュッと絞る癖がある: Tend to perk up tightly in \ndo-or-die moments.
text.1人でいる時は、帽子をとって風に当てる: When alone, she takes off \nher hat to feel the breeze.
text.甘えたい時、ついついパタパタ揺れちゃう: When she wants to be doted on, they \nsubconsciously start flapping.
text.両耳のカバーはパパの手作り: Both of her ear covers \nwere handmade by her dad.
text.メンコは絶対つけ忘れない: Never forgets to wear \nher ear covers
text.ゴングの音に反応してしまう: Always respond to the \nsound of a gong
text.着替えの最後はメンコをつけて、気合い入魂: She leaves putting on her ear covers \nfor last and they get her fired up.
text.“シグナル”受信に最適なパラボラ形状: Have the optimal parabola shape \nfor picking up "signals"
text.寝起きから、ピンと立つまで時間がかかる: Take a while to point up straight \nafter sleeping.
text.ピンと凜々しく立っていることが多い: Often stand up sharp and undaunted.
text.スキンシップ中はだらんと垂れてリラックス: They droop down in a relaxed manner \nduring skinship.
